page.title: 15AIDEES PERFUMES BOVEY TRACEY
page.content: At{Aidees}the employees put perfume in the pomanders. They have several barrels of{lavender}and {roses.}Women also put{transfers}on{soaps}and{soap {dishes}and sometimes even{tiles.}To make the transfers stick on properly and make the colours clearer they have to put wax over them.The ingredients of soaps are tallow,salts, water and perfume.Some soaps go with soap dishes with the same transfers on.When the pomanders, soaps and soap dishes are packed, they are put in plastic bags and put in boxes.The boxes also have in them polystyrene chips to protect them.The transfers are sometimes put on the tiles for a certain design so that there is more choice and so that they are not all plain.Also in the factory they have little clay houses as pomanders. They stack the transfers on shelves,ready to take down quickly.
